column1: Nucleotide sequence accession and contextual data availability 16S rRNA amplicon and shotgun metagenomic data are publicly available under SRA Bioproject PRJNA248084 ( https: / / www. ncbi. nlm. nih. gov / bioproject / PRJNA248084 /).
The 16S and 18S rRNA amplicons were prepared according to the Illumina 16S Metagenomic Sequencing Library Preparation guide [ 19] and as described previously [ 20].
